title: Estádio 24 de Setembro
text:
Estádio Nacional 24 de Setembro is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Bissau">Bissau</a>, <a href="Guinea%20Bissau">Guinea Bissau</a>. The stadium opened its doors in 1989. It is currently used primarily for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches, and the stadium holds 20,000 people. It is currently the home ground of the <a href="Guinea-Bissau%20national%20football%20team">Guinea-Bissau national football team</a>.
Usage.
Football (soccer) clubs compete in the stadium including the city's chief teams of <a href="Sport%20Bissau%20e%20Benfica">Benfica Bissau</a> and <a href="SC%20de%20Bissau">Sporting Bissau</a> which are also the country's popular teams. Other clubs playing at the stadium includes <a href="UD%20Internacional">Inter Bissau</a> and <a href="Sport%20Portos%20de%20Bissau">Portos de Bissau</a>. Athletics is also used in the stadium.
